display_long_description:
Get it now on Early Access (with 30% discount).

Tired of the same old first-person shooters? Get ready to embark on a cosmic journey like no other in Dream Tango: Ascension, a Celestial Wave Shooter that takes you beyond the ordinary.

Dream Tango is not just a game—it's a first-of-its-kind, expansive, immersive saga that will unfold across multiple mediums. Inspired by the concept of astral projection, this thrilling adventure will be brought to life through VR games and an animated series, creating a rich, multidimensional universe.

In Dream Tango: Ascension, the Primordial Gods have hidden the powerful Items of Creation at the highest point in the cosmos—the Astral Sanctum. You play as a young spirit traveler, lost and with only faint memories of your past, set on a path to reclaim these cosmic relics. This VR wave shooter combines fast-paced combat with melee mechanics, plunging you into intense arenas where you must defeat waves of Hecate-Astraea’s minions. Raise your XP, climb the Celestial Leaderboard, and uncover hidden secrets that reveal your true origin.

The final destination? The Higher Sanctum of the Dream Dimension, where an epic battle against a god-like being awaits. This might just be one of the most jaw-dropping boss battles VR has ever seen.

Dream Tango: Ascension delivers an action-packed experience that will keep you hooked. And the journey is just beginning—the world of Dream Tango will soon unravel through various mediums, so stay tuned for updates!
